---
title: "CUSP - Extract State Population and Population Density"
author: 'Ruby Han'
date: "04/02/2021"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r load packages, message=FALSE}
# read excel format
library(readxl)

library(janitor)
```

```{r load data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
state_characteristics <- read_excel("~/W203_RDataHub/lab_2-rbgs/data/raw/CUSP.xlsx", sheet = "State Characteristics")
state_char <- state_characteristics %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  select(
    state
    ,population_density_per_square_mile
    ,population_2018
  )
  
state_char
```

```{r write transformed data to csv}
write.csv(state_char,
           file = paste0("~/W203_RDataHub/lab_2-rbgs/data/interim/",
                          "state_char.csv"))
```
